extDescription.message: Quickly switch between customized search engines; Add a custom search engine in the right-click menu.

optionsSortIdTip.message: After saving, the field will be sorted from small to large

optionsInPopupTip.message: When selected, it will be displayed on the popup page (click the plug-in in the upper right corner of the browser to pop up the page)

inRightTip.message: When selected, it will be displayed in the right-click menu (if only one is selected, it will appear in the top-level right-click menu)

inShortcutsTip.message: When selected, the shortcut key can be switched in the search engine. For example, on the Baidu search page, press the shortcut key to quickly switch to Google search

searchIcon.message: Icon URL, usually the root address of the website + '/favicon ico'

tabTip.message: Press Tab to switch the search engine
